ai-patthana16.78:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.78:0.3_0: He should see his innerability, requesting,
ai-patthana16.78:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit gives up, and desire to be given up.
ai-patthana16.78:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.78:2.1_0: six things come to an end. ...
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_0: Not seeing the state of not repulsion should be given up by not seeing, by seeing, by what is to be given up, and by not seeing its cause and condition.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_1: Not seeing the state of not repulsion should be given up by not seeing, by not seeing, by what is to be given up, and by not seeing a cause and condition.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_2: Some things don’t be given up by not grasping. They don’t give up resentment for seeing showing the states of loss. They don’t give up repulsion and not seeing because of what is cause and condition.
ai-patthana16.78:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
